alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 415 AM CDT... At 344 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Swan River, to near Toivola, to 6 miles south of Meadowlands, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Toivola around 355 AM CDT. Meadowlands around 400 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Kelsey, Nichols Lake, Payne, Elmer, Prosit and Little Swan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis
